text: Maki Kureishi (1927â€“1995) was a Pakistani poet writing in English, known for her delicate and highly sensitive poetry. Entry about Maki Kureishi at Literary Encyclopedia She taught for many years at the University of Karachi in Karachi, Pakistan. She was the aunt of English writer Hanif Kureishi. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Pakistani poets
title: Maki Kureishi
